experience: You and Andrea both know Glen Chamberlain, Joe Pierce, and 15 others
Andrea can introduce you to 15 people at CVS Health

Someone recently said to me "We've met the best candidate, but the manager wants to meet more people. You know. It's like when you try on 100 outfits but you end up with the 1st one you try on". Well, not really...because the outfit can't say "I'm not interested in being bought by you. You took too long, weren't into me, and I've already moved on!" People are not products. #hirebetter #foodforthought
I give employees a lot of leeway in breaks, lunch time, work from home, sick days, family leave, and further education.

I don't believe in micromanaging.  It sucks the life out and creates a high stress environment.  A good employee will work hard because they believe in the company culture.  If I had to micromanage an employee... they wouldn't be here long.   Hire the right people and give them room to do their jobs.

CVS Health, through our unmatched breadth of service offerings, is transforming the delivery of health care services in the U.S. We are an innovative, fast-growing company guided by values that focus on teamwork, integrity and respect for our colleagues and customers. What are we looking for in our colleagues? We seek fresh ideas, new perspectives, a diversity of experiences, and a dedication to service that will help us better meet the needs of the many people and businesses that rely on us each day.

- Serve as a liaison between the recruiting and sourcing functions- Develop and drive high priority, targeted sourcing strategies for high volume and niche skill set hiring- Establish and manage timelines and focus for short term, long term, and ad hoc projects- Partner with members of the leadership team to establish process improvements and best practices- Drive passive candidate engagement through social media and email campaign marketing- Conduct market research and provide updates to the core client team- Conduct candidate search to generate passive leadsSevenstep is a global leader in recruitment outsourcing providing true talent acquisition wins and business performance gains for enterprise clients across six continents. With delivery centers around the world, Sevenstep is a non-stop recruiting force delivering a powerful suite of outsourced Talent Solutions including: Enterprise, Project, Blended, Data Analytics and Employer Branding & Talent Attraction. With an unbounded approach, Sevenstep unleashes the possibilities of talent and trusted partnerships.

- Responsible for the recruitment of Manufacturing talent (temporary and permanent, entry level to senior management) and special project recruitment on an as needed basis- Established and maintained strong relationships with hiring managers and key stakeholders- Created effective and creative channels for sourcing and recruiting top talent in the local market- Guided candidates through the recruitment and hiring processes to ensure a positive candidate experience- Maintained compliance with recruitment and hiring guidelines through HR and management/leadership partnerships- Served as the Workday SME and technical trainer for existing and new team members- Client supported: Lonza (onsite)

- Contacted active and passive candidates through multiple channels to gauge interest in job opportunities (i.e. social media, cold calling, email campaigns)- Prepared candidates for the hiring process- Led team, client, and company initiatives and projects- Client supported: Express Scripts

- Developed and implemented continuous improvement/process improvement projects across departments- Created e-mail templates and marketing strategies for campaigns sent to client talent communities- Led team, client, and company initiatives and projects- Clients supported: Harley-Davidson Motor Company and Express Scripts

recommendations: Erin Lynch, PHR
Corporate Recruiting Lead at Boston Beer Company
June 8, 2015, Erin managed Andrea directly

I managed Andrea directly as a Sourcing Manager for SevenStep on the General Motors account. Then indirectly managed her as a Recruiting Manager for our Harley-Davidson account. In both instances, Andrea proved that no req was too difficult for her to find candidate leads for. She worked on the hardest IT positions that General Motors could stew up. Based on her work, whole teams of IT professionals were hired into the company with a quick turnaround. At Harley-Davidson Andrea developed more that just candidate leads. She threw herself into the employment branding for the client and worked on developing H-D's employment presence. She is driven and passionate in her H-D work. She gets excited when her candidates are interviewing and looks forward to hearing "they were hired for the impossible role." Andrea is a phenomenal Lead Sourcing Specialist. She never backs down from her work and tackles every position. She also has taught a number of entry-level Sourcers and developed her peers' skill-sets. There is nothing this lady can't do!
Erin Lynch, PHR
Corporate Recruiting Lead at Boston Beer Company

Tamla Dorsey
Talent Ambassador for Nurse Recruitment efforts at Express Scripts @TamlaTweets
March 23, 2017, Tamla worked with Andrea in the same group

I worked with Tamla on several major hiring initiatives at Express Scripts. Tamla was my point of contact for all nurse recruitment, as I was part of a RPO provider team that delivered recruiting solutions to Express Scripts.From day one, Tamla was welcoming, friendly, energetic, personable, professional, and simply knew how to get the job done...the right way. Tamla never left anything in the air; any question or concern I went to her with was addressed in a timely fashion and with with great detail. She was an excellent partner in our efforts to source and recruit the best nursing talent in the United States for some very challenging geographical areas and positions. I would work with Tamla again in a heartbeat, and I would highly recommend her for any project or opportunity that comes her way. In my career, she has been one of my absolute favorite people to work with, and I hope our paths cross again someday. Tamla would be an asset to any company/organization or team!
Tamla Dorsey

Corporate Recruiting Lead at Boston Beer Company
March 23, 2016, Andrea reported directly to Erin

Erin directly managed me during my time as an entry-level Sourcer, a Senior Sourcer, and a Lead Sourcer in the Talent Acquisition field. She also indirectly managed me following my transition to a Lead Sourcer role. We worked on several accounts together, including General Motors and Harley-Davidson Motor Company. I cannot say enough about Erin to demonstrate how positive my experience was during the time I reported to her and worked alongside her. Erin is a prime and stellar example of what a Manager should embody, in every aspect of the word. She is fearless, relentless in her pursuit of success, helpful, dedicated, friendly, personable, and one of the hardest working individuals I have ever known. I can truly say that I will never work with someone like Erin again; she is one of a kind. Her guidance, focus, and devotion to her staff has been instrumental in my own personal development, and for that I am extremely grateful. I would recommend Erin without hesitation for any role, and she would be a top asset to any company.
Erin Lynch, PHR

summary: I am an experienced RPO talent acquisition partner with a blended background in research and analysis, sourcing, and recruiting with several Fortune 500 clients, including General Motors, Harley-Davidson Motor Company, Express Scripts, and CVS Health. In addition to my full cycle, end-to-end sourcing and recruiting experience, I have also been responsible for conducting extensive market research and building strong client and stakeholder relationships. I have contributed to driving change and increased collaboration between sourcing and recruiting departments, and I also train groups and individuals one-on-one from entry-level to leadership. My areas of interest include social media marketing, compliance/legal, training and development, and military/veteran hiring.I currently work for Sevenstep as a Sourcing Business Partner within the Talent Services department. Sevenstep, headquartered in Boston, MA, is ranked 6th and 13th, respectively, in the breadth of service and size of deals categories, and 11th overall in HRO Today’s 2017 Baker’s Dozen Customer Satisfaction Rankings.I hold BA and MSc degrees from Suffolk University in Boston, Massachusetts.
name: Andrea Blasdale
title: Sourcing Business Partner at CVS Health
